# Main Pantheon

![](data:image/png;base64,)

|||||
|---|---|---|---|
|**Deity**|**Alignment**|**Areas of Concern**|**Domains**|
|Abadar|LN|Cities, Law, Merchants, Wealth|Cities, earth, travel, wealth|
|Asmodeus|LE|Tyranny, Slavery, Pride, Contracts|Confidence, fire, trickery, tyranny|
|Calistria|CN|Lust, Revenge, Trickery|Pain, passion, secrecy, trickery|
|Cayden Cailean|CG|Freedom, Ale, Wine, Bravery|Cities, freedom, indulgence, might|
|Desna|CG|Dreams, Luck, Stars, Travelers|Dreams, luck, moon, travel, stars, void|
|Erastil|LG|Family, Farming, Hunting, Trade|Earth, family, nature, wealth|
|Gorum|CN|Strength, Battle, Weapons|Confidence, destruction, might, zeal|
|Gozreh|N|Nature, Weather, The Sea|Air, nature, travel, water|
|Groetus|CN|Empty Places, Oblivion, Ruins|Darkness, destruction, nightmares, void|
|Iomedae|LG|Honour, Justice, Rulership, Valour|Confidence, might, truth, zeal|
|Irori|LN|History, Knowledge, Self-perfection|Knowledge, might, perfection, truth|
|Lamashtu|CE|Aberrance, Madness, Monsters, Nightmares|Family, might, nightmares, trickery|
|Nethys|N|Magic|Destruction, knowledge, magic, protection, glyph|
|Norgorber|NE|Greed, Secrets, Poison, Murder|Death, secrecy, trickery, wealth|
|Pharasma|N|Birth, Death, Fate, Prophecy, Rebirth|Death, fate, healing, knowledge, soul, time|
|Razmir|LE|False God|N/A|
|Rovagug|CE|Wrath, Disaster, Destruction|Air, destruction, earth, zeal|
|Sarenrae|NG|Sun, Redemption, Honesty, Healing|Fire, healing, sun, truth|
|Shelyn|NG|Art, Beauty, Love, Music|Creation, family, passion, protection|
|Torag|LG|Forge, Protection, Strategy|Creation, earth, family, protection|
|Urgathoa|NE|Gluttony, Disease, Undeath|Indulgence, magic, might, undeath|
|Zon-Kuthon|LE|Envy, Pain, Darkness, Loss|Ambition, darkness, destruction, pain|
